name: open-highlight
description: Cross-browser extension to highlight and save text snippets

scripts.build:chrome: npm run build && cd chrome && zip -r ../open-highlight-chrome.zip .
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build && cd firefox && zip -r ../open-highlight-firefox.zip .
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.dev:chrome: npm run build && echo 'ðŸš€ Load chrome/ directory in Chrome Developer Mode'
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run build && echo 'ðŸš€ Load firefox/ directory as temporary addon in Firefox'
scripts.dev:firefox-run: npm run build && web-ext run --source-dir firefox/
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch icons --ext js,html,css,json,png --exec 'npm run build'

author: Keagan
